- Why: Why this change is necessary.

- How: Brief notes about the approach taken and the main files changed.

## Testing

- Tests added: Yes/No
- How to run locally:

```bash
# Build and run tests with test helpers

```

- [ ] Commit message follows Conventional Commits format
